entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:13 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
